trans-unit.source: Defines a metadata and query source implementation for a custom data service provider.
trans-unit.target: 自定义数据服务提供程序定义的元数据和查询的源实现。

trans-unit.source: The data source object from which data is provided.
trans-unit.target: 从其提供数据的数据源对象。

trans-unit.source: The data source.
trans-unit.target: 数据源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the open property.
trans-unit.target: 获取打开的属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Instance of the type that declares the open property.
trans-unit.target: 声明打开的属性的类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: Name of the open property.
trans-unit.target: 打开的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The value of the open property.
trans-unit.target: 打开属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name and values of all the properties that are defined in the given instance of an open type.
trans-unit.target: 获取的名称和在给定的开放类型实例中定义的所有属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Instance of the type that declares the open property.
trans-unit.target: 声明打开的属性的类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: A collection of name and values of all the open properties.
trans-unit.target: 名称和所有打开的属性的值的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the open property.
trans-unit.target: 获取打开的属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Instance of the type that declares the open property.
trans-unit.target: 声明打开的属性的类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: Value for the open property.
trans-unit.target: 打开属性值。

trans-unit.source: Value for the property.
trans-unit.target: 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601> that represents the container.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>表示的容器。

trans-unit.source: The resource set.
trans-unit.target: 资源集。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601> that represents the resource set, or a value if there is no resource set for the specified resourceSet.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601> ，它表示资源组中，或值如果不没有指定任何资源集 resourceSet 。

trans-unit.source: Gets the resource type for the instance that is specified by the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 获取由参数指定的实例的资源类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns `true` if the given instance represents a collection; otherwise returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 返回`true`如果给定的实例表示的集合; 否则，返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Instance to extract a resource type from.
trans-unit.target: 若要提取中的资源类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType"></xref> of the supplied object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType"> </xref>所提供对象。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the given service operation and returns the results.
trans-unit.target: 调用给定的服务操作并返回结果。

trans-unit.source: Service operation to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 要调用的服务操作。

trans-unit.source: Values of parameters to pass to the service operation.
trans-unit.target: 要传递到服务操作的参数的值。

trans-unit.source: The result of the service operation, or a <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> value for a service operation that returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_void" name="void" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 服务操作的结果或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>值返回的服务操作<xref uid="langword_csharp_void" name="void" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether null propagation is required in expression trees.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否将 null 传播要求表达式树中。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether null propagation is required.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Boolean>值，该值指示是否需要 null 传播。</xref:System.Boolean>
